content: Phase 1: Create POC test script for AI decision structuring with 3 scenarios
Phase 1: Test and validate Gemini generates 6-step structure correctly
Phase 1: Verify evidence labeling and max 3 alternatives constraint
Phase 1: Test guardrails (AI refuses planning/prediction requests)
Phase 1: Fix POC until all validations pass
Phase 1: All user stories covered in POC testing
Phase 2: Get design guidelines from design_agent
Phase 2: Backend implementation (auth, cases, AI draft, decisions, audit)
Phase 2: Frontend implementation (auth, dashboard, case management, approval workflow)
Phase 2: All user stories covered in Development
Phase 2: End to End Testing using Testing Agent
